summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: HomePage hero now points to the requested phoenix asset and explicitly sets 564x483 dimensions. However, two additional non-requested files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the homepage hero image reference in HomePage.tsx and did not request regenerating or editing file summary documentation.
BuildRequest did not request changes to project state metadata; only the homepage hero asset reference was requested.
